select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from sportlist
order by sfno asc) a) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select * from sportlist where sfno= (select prevDto from (select sfno,lead(sfno,1,-1) over(order by sfno asc) as prevDto from sportlist order by sfno asc) where sfno=#{sfno})
select * from sportlist where sfno= (select nextDto from (select sfno,lag(sfno,1,-1) over(order by sfno asc) as nextDto from sportlist order by sfno asc) where sfno=#{sfno})
